response.job_title: Digital engineering advisor at 3 ENGINEERING GROUP S.A.S. - 3EGco
response.summary: Experienced Engineering Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the mechanical engineering industry. Skilled in AutoCAD, FEM analysis, Computer Science, Management, and ANSYS. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering focused on Computer Aided Engineering from Universidad Nacional de Colombia.
response.skills: Engineering, CAE, CAD/CAM, FEM analysis, ANSYS, Project Management, Project Engineering, Project Planning, Autodesk Inventor, Management, AutoCAD, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, Mechanical Engineering, Computer Hardware, Computer Science, Programming

profile_positions.description: Leading role at different engineering projects, including CAD, CAE, software and specialized simulations.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Manager

profile_positions.description: Design engineer for machinery related to pavement and rock crushing.
profile_positions.title: Design Engineer

company.name: 3 ENGINEERING GROUP - 3EG S.A.S.
company.description:
We are a provider of engineering services with innovative work methodologies, we offer technological and development solutions through cutting-edge computer tools, applying regulations (ISO, API, NACE, ASME, ASTM, NTC) in different sectors of the industry.

We help our clients to be more competitive, obtaining the maximum and safest benefit from their assets, being recognized for quality, innovative, practical, and competitive solutions.

Our focus areas:

Design and Simulation
· Mechanical design of industrial machinery
· Static and dynamic structural simulation and verification by finite elements

Digital engineering
· Gathering of As-Built information on plants, stations, and process equipment: conventional survey, laser survey and 3D scanning
· 2D and 3D As-Built Digitization
· Generation of engineering documents: plans, isometries, lists of materials, databases
· Information management: integrations with ERP and analysis, visualization, and data intelligence

Asset Integrity
· Failure Analysis
· Assessment of fitness for service of pressure vessels, piping, and storage tanks (Fitness for Service)
· Risk assessment by API RP 581 methodology - Risk-based Inspection (R.B.I)
· Internal and external corrosion analysis I.C.D.A – E.C.D.A.

Energy
· Consulting for energy transition (Photovoltaic and Hydrogen)
· Calculation, design and simulation of equipment and facilities

Software and Applications
· Administration and efficient management of information
· Development of customized software products and solutions
